about_the_game:
Become hero of the 1917 revolution in Russia! Pioneers of the Fist occupied the Castle Samozbor. You are the best liquidator Red Army does have.
Crush the members of counter-revolution and escape your doom.

Vanquish your foes with bricks, your own weight or bombs.

Saturday of Piercing Screams features:
+ Legendary cursed infinite-spanning castle
+ 64 levels (8 in demo)
+ Destructible environment
+ 914 pioneers
+ Flexing between levels
+ Enduring but simple gameplay

content_descriptors.notes: Game contains violence, blood and gore.

detailed_description:
Become hero of the 1917 revolution in Russia! Pioneers of the Fist occupied the Castle Samozbor. You are the best liquidator Red Army does have.
Crush the members of counter-revolution and escape your doom.

Vanquish your foes with bricks, your own weight or bombs.

Saturday of Piercing Screams features:

+ Enduring but simple gameplay

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vega 3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64 bit
  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 560 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Processor: Core2Duo 2.4GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 320m
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 10.13
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

name: Saturday of Piercing Screams Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Athlon 200ge
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vega 3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Ryzen5 3600
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 560 or better
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

short_description: Enemy made the cursed infinite-spanning castle Samozbor as their base. You are best liquidator in the world. Can you survive the ordeals of that forbidden dimension and come home alive?
